title: Green garden country
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Ronald Bowie and Conon Fraser
brief_description: From parks and public gardens to the backyard enthusiast, this film shows how New Zealand’s extraordinary variety of shrubs and flowers from all parts of the world contribute to an enviable way of life in New Zealand.
creator_credit_for_label: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Ronald Bowie and Conon Fraser
description: From parks and public gardens to the backyard enthusiast, this film shows how New Zealand’s extraordinary variety of shrubs and flowers from all parts of the world contribute to an enviable way of life in New Zealand.
